div.class: fixed bottom-4 right-4 z-50 flex

header.class: sticky w-full top-0 px-6 py-3 flex justify-between items-center nav-bg backdrop-blur z-30 lg:px-16 lg:py-4 xl:px-24 xl:py-5 min-[1400px]:px-28 min-[1400px]:py-6

img.class: h-8 lg:h-[34px] xl:h-[36px] min-[1400px]:h-[36px]

h3.class: lg:text-[26px] xl:text-[28px] min-[1400px]:text-[30px]

ul.class: hidden w-full text-sm text-center gap-x-8 min-[1400px]:text-base lg:flex

div.class: relative lg:hidden astro-MB2I55HJ

label.class: relative flex flex-col gap-y-1 cursor-pointer z-20 astro-MB2I55HJ

third h-1 w-7 bg-[#255ce8] rounded-full duration-300 astro-MB2I55HJ

ul.class: w-full text-center text-lg font-medium space-y-4 astro-MB2I55HJ

div.class: flex flex-col items-center gap-y-10

main.class: w-full lg:px-16 lg:flex lg:justify-between lg:items-center xl:px-24 min-[1400px]:px-28

h3.class: text-center font-medium sm:text-[18px] lg:text-[20px] lg:text-left xl:text-[22px] min-[1400px]:text-[24px]

h1.class: mt-2 mb-4 text-center text-[26px] font-black sm:text-[32px] lg:text-[38px] lg:text-left xl:text-[44px] xl:mt-2 xl:mb-6 min-[1400px]:text-[48px]

section.h1:
FULL STACK DEVELOPER
COMPUTER ENGINEER
& UI UX DESIGNER

div.class: text-center font-medium space-x-2 sm:text-[18px] lg:text-[20px] lg:text-left xl:text-[22px] xl:space-x-4 min-[1400px]:text-[24px]

px-6 py-2 secondary-btn rounded-full duration-200 hover:scale-105

img.class: h-16 xl:h-20 stroke-color

div.p: Zone is a Pomodoro app that is built from scratch with no third-party library, it comes with settings to help the user configure the timer as he wants.

main.class: mt-8 px-8 grid grid-cols-1 place-items-center gap-y-16 lg:flex lg:items-center lg:flex-row-reverse lg:gap-x-16 lg:mt-0

p.class: font-light md:text-[17px] lg:text-[18px] xl:text-[19px] min-[1400px]:text-[20px]

section.p: Masterâ€™s degree in Computer Engineering, Junior Full-Stuck Developer, and UI UX Designer with almost 3 years of experience able to build web applications from scratch. Extremely passionate about new technologies, and modern design combined with sensitivity to serve the needs of the business balanced with delivering high-quality solutions.

main.p: Great work. It was a great experience working with Scalarz. He is friendly & expert in front end.

main.p: very good serverless developer. patient . understanding and passionate about what he does. all the success to you.
